job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Computer Software,Consumer Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: About the jobWe are a hyper-growth eCommerce start-up with a mission to bring a smile to people's faces by connecting them to products that bring nourishment, love, memories, connection, nostalgia, and comfort. We've recently closed our Series C funding for $110M and are looking to scale our AI & Data practice. We are looking for a top Machine Learning Engineer to join our team in New York. You will be joining a small team of experienced ML engineers and have the opportunity to learn and have a significant impact on mission critical projects. The team is building deep learning models for RecSystems, Personalization, and Search functionality. Core ResponsibilitiesCollaborate with cross-functional teams of data scientists, data engineers, software engineers, and machine learning engineers. Research and implement best-in-class ML approaches to e-commerce problems. Develop a deep subject matter expertise of how our marketplace functions across the entire user journeyOwn and iterate upon our various recommendation , personalization, and search engines. Oversee end-to-end model lifecycle developmentDeploy ML models into productionDrive meaningful ROI and impact upon our full funnel acquisition and retentionBasic QualificationsB.S. in a quantitative field i.e. Computer Science, Engineering, Physics, Mathematics, etc. 1-5 years of experience building production level Machine Learning models Excellent programming and debugging skills in PythonExperience with deep learning frameworks & libraries i.e. PyTorch, Tensorflow, etc. Strong ML background in at least one of the following areas: NLP, Search, recommendation, personalization, ranking/relevance, etc. Nice to Have: Advanced Degree in a quantitative field (M.S. / Ph.D) Direct E-Commerce Experience
